articleExcerpt: This piece is a Socratic dialogue on the idea of the Hydra Offense, a football philosophy built around running two distinct offenses under two coordinators. Not a wrinkle, but a complete reimagining of how the game could be played: maximizing roster depth, multiplying roles, and forcing opponents to prepare for contradictions.
